column2: <START> China got caught cheating in the Wuhan military games in 2019 China got caught cheating in the 2008 Beijing Olympics Its what they do Lie cheat steal copy hack and spy When it comes to these sporting events besides the doping programs of their athletes they cheat Now with the referees Its shameful Just one more reason why the Olympic games should never have been awarded to China againBeijing Olympic Referees caught cheating againhttpsyoutubeT3g6dDR6g
